Articles.Content:
Not sure if this is the proper sub-forums for this. Hopefully so.

Was wondering if there was a setting somewhere to disable on screen messages. (like running out of electircel charge, ship name etc) Trying to make some KSP video's and would like to not see those whenever i have the interface removed (via F2)

Attempted a forum and google search to no avail, my google-fu is weak today. Any answers anyone has would be appreciated.

Thanks!

Edited August 1, 2014 by rabidninjawombat
Thanks! You rock...+rep for you... Not sure why i couldnt find that.
